name: Widow of Arach-Tinilith Starting Feature (1st level)

description.value:
You gain a spiderling of Lolth familiar. This familiar uses the rules for arcane familiars found in Arcane Power.
If you gain another familiar or similar companion, such as those granted by the Arcane Familiar or Elemental Companion feats, you lose the use of the spiderling familiar.
